name: ExchangeBase
tag_list: sustainability, green, enterprise-software, software, recycle, reduce, reuse, saas
overview:
ExchangeBase is cloud software to optimize how you sell your surplus assets.

Whether you have 20 locations or 20,000, ExchangeBase provides an enterprise solution that gives you software to create visibility across your organization. The master catalog option gives your headquarter location a blueprint to share with all of the locations. From there, each location or region can update quantities, best practices and approved vendors in real time. As a result, you can sell more idle assets, move items internally or just improve your processes through better reporting.
